name: recceda-form
description: A lightweight JavaScript library for dynamically generating forms from Recceda schemas

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.browser.json
scripts.minify: cp src/standalone.js build/recceda.js && terser build/recceda.js -o build/recceda.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run minify

author: Recceda
